description: The Male Factory Worker, Type-3 emoji is a sequence of the  Man,  Emoji Modifier Fitzpatrick Type-3 and  Factory emojis. These are com
apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the man factory worker emoji features a person of medium-light skin tone wearing a sturdy hard hat and work clothes, embodying diligence and industry. The emoji is rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and subtle 3D depth, giving the uniform and helmet a polished, tactile appearance. This emoji represents hard work, labor, or the manufacturing sector, often used to discuss employment, projects, or the fruits of one's labor.
